Summary: Remove hardcoded MongoDB credentials from source code
Description: LatestPhasenetLocalTest/phasenet/predict.py (lines 29-32) contains hardcoded MongoDB credentials (root/quakeflow123). Move to environment variables or secrets management. Acceptance: Credentials read from env vars; .env.example documents required vars; .env in .gitignore.

Summary: Fix command injection vulnerability in sampleChunkToMSEED
Description: LatestPhasenetLocalTest/sampleChunkToMSEED.py (line 99) uses os.system() with string concatenation vulnerable to shell injection. Replace with subprocess.run() using list arguments. Acceptance: os.system() replaced; args passed as list; return code checked.

Summary: Fix GaMMa hourly processing bug - wrong variable passed to association()
Description: GaMMaTest/GaMMaTest.py (line 29): when processing >5000 picks hourly the code filters into picks_ but passes unfiltered picks to association(). Change to association(picks_ ...). Acceptance: Verified hourly filtering works correctly.

Summary: Fix event processing loop early break in GaMMa
Description: GaMMaTest/GaMMaTest.py (lines 277-281) has a break statement causing the event loop to exit after the first event. Only first event magnitude/probability extracted. Acceptance: break removed; all events processed; output verified.

Summary: Remove or complete dead code in GaMMa event analysis loop
Description: GaMMaTest/GaMMaTest.py (lines 246-248) loops through events and filters high-probability picks but never uses the result. Either complete the analysis or remove the dead code.

Summary: Tune GaMMa parameters to reduce over-detection
Description: GaMMa currently detects more events than actually exist (overly aggressive). Tune: min_picks_per_eq, dbscan_eps, max_sigma11/22/12 thresholds. Acceptance: Test against known catalog (Ridgecrest); false positive rate documented; optimal params with rationale.

Summary: Create GaMMa parameter configuration file
Description: Extract hardcoded GaMMa config (GaMMaTest.py lines 96-126) into YAML/JSON. Parameters include degree2km, velocity model, DBSCAN settings. Acceptance: config file created; script reads from file; CLI override for path; defaults documented.

Summary: Investigate and fix amplitude calculation in Latest PhaseNet
Description: README documents amplitudes are wrong in Latest PhaseNet. Root cause analysis needed - may involve tracing seismological processing (integration, filtering, instrument response). Acceptance: Root cause identified; fix implemented; regression test created.

Summary: Document Earlier PhaseNet reliability issues
Description: Earlier PhaseNet noted as having unreliable results but good speed. Document specific failure modes, when/why it fails, and conditions where it may still be useful. Acceptance: Failure modes documented; comparison with Latest PhaseNet; keep/archive/deprecate recommendation.

Summary: Parameterize test dataset selection
Description: Multiple files use commented-out lines to switch datasets (app_RT_ampCalc.py lines 215-219). Replace with argparse or config. Acceptance: CLI-based dataset selection; all existing options available; default specified.

Summary: Make model paths configurable
Description: Model path model/190703-214543 hardcoded in predict.py, app.py, app_RT_ampCalc.py, slide_window.py. Add --model-path argument. Acceptance: CLI arg added; default preserved; path validated at startup.

Summary: Fix all bare exception handlers
Description: Multiple bare except: clauses in data_reader.py (194-196, 458), predict.py (41-43), app_RT_ampCalc.py (134-138). Replace with except Exception as e: and log details. Acceptance: All bare excepts fixed; exception details logged.

Summary: Add error handling to main entry points
Description: Main blocks in GaMMaTest.py, app_RT_ampCalc.py, sampleChunkToMSEED.py have no try-except. Any error crashes with no graceful handling. Acceptance: Main blocks wrapped; meaningful error messages; non-zero exit codes.

Summary: Replace print() with Python logging module
Description: All components use print() for output. Replace with structured logging. Acceptance: All print() replaced with logging.*(); format includes timestamp/level/module; level configurable.

Summary: Add input CSV validation
Description: No validation of CSV structure, columns, types, or ranges. Bad data propagates silently. Acceptance: Schema validation for picks and stations CSVs; clear error messages; validation at startup.

Summary: Clean up commented-out code
Description: Large blocks of commented-out code in data_reader.py, visulization.py, and others. Remove dead code or add explanatory comments. Acceptance: Dead code removed; intentionally-disabled code explained; git history preserved.

Summary: Fix filename typo: visulization.py to visualization.py
Description: LatestPhasenetLocalTest/phasenet/visulization.py is misspelled. Rename and update all imports. Acceptance: File renamed; imports updated; no broken references.

Summary: Create test framework and directory structure
Description: No test files exist. Create tests/ directory with pytest configuration and test fixtures for sample seismic data. Acceptance: tests/ created; pytest configured; fixtures for sample data; CI-ready.

Summary: Add unit tests for PhaseNet pick extraction
Description: Validate PhaseNet pick extraction against known correct picks from Ridgecrest test data. Acceptance: Tests for Latest and Earlier PhaseNet; known-good picks as fixtures; validate times, phases, probabilities.

Summary: Add unit tests for GaMMa association
Description: Validate GaMMa event association against known event catalog. Acceptance: Tests for accuracy and false positive rate; known catalog as fixture; edge case tests.

Summary: Add integration test for full pipeline
Description: End-to-end: raw data -> PhaseNet picks -> GaMMa association -> event catalog. Acceptance: Full pipeline in test mode; output compared to expected catalog; test data included.

Summary: Create data flow documentation
Description: Document data flow: raw seismic -> MSEED -> PhaseNet -> picks CSV -> GaMMa -> event catalog. Include input/output formats for each stage. Acceptance: Flow diagram; format specs; example data at each stage.

Summary: Document GaMMa parameter sensitivity
Description: As part of GaMMa tuning document parameter sensitivity and effects on detection results. Acceptance: Each parameter documented with range/default/effect; recommended values for different use cases.
